Html:
Hi,
Im New to Prism.Can any1 knows differences between Composite Application Library and Composiste Application Block.
I Knew tht Prism is Code name of Composite Application Block.

Also can any1 show me differences between CAL and CAB.


With Regards,
Mahender

Hi Mahender,

 

The documentation of the Prism v2  - Drop 10 includes the following topic to help Composite UI Application Block developers familiarize themselves with the Composite Application Library, by comparing the main components of both libraries. Perhaps you could find it useful.

·         Upgrading from the Composite UI Application Block

The documentation also includes an article that provides guidance to choose a P&P deliverable for building composite applications:

·         Overview | Guidelines for Choosing Composite UI Deliverables from patterns & practices

 

If you do not want to download the latest drop of Prism v2, you can browse online the previous version of these topics (that target the Composite Application Guidance for WPF - June 2008 release):

·         Composite Application Guidance for CAB Developers

·         Guidelines for Choosing Composite UI Deliverables from patterns & practices

 

Please let me know if this helps.

 

Mariano Converti

http://blogs.southworks.net/mconverti
